page.title: 05FARMING-DAIRY FARMING
page.content: We talked to a dairy farm worker.They have 194 milkers in their herd,which takes 3 hours to milk daily.The cows which had just calved were in a seperate field resting for a few months. They use modern milking methods which takes a shorter time.Many fields were used for rough grazing_some were used for silage. We were told that if the farm produced more than their milk quota (Which was 1300,000 litres a year) they have to pay the government.If they produce less,they get money back to buy cattle so that they can produce more.
